sourceMeaningMnemonic: You take some <radical>bamboo</radical> and <radical>attach</radical> it together into a <kanji>token</kanji> of appreciation for your friend. Your friend greatly appreciates this token of friendship.
meaningInfo: Imagine trying to attach some bamboo together into a token for someone.
readingMnemonic: You hand over the <kanji>token</kanji> but your friend drops it and yells, "You <reading>foo</reading>l (<ja>ふ</ja>)! I'm allergic to bamboo!"
readingInfo: Imagine the embarrassment you feel, forgetting they were allergic to bamboo. Oh well, it’s the thought that counts. You’re still a fool, though.
